text: Electra ( Ilektra) is a 1962 Greek drama movie directed by Michael Cacoyannis and based on the play of the same name by Euripides. It stars Irene Papas, Giannis Fertis, Aleka Katselli, Manos Katrakis and was nominated for an Academy Awards in 1963. ==Other websites== * Category:1962 drama movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Michael Cacoyannis
title: Electra (1962 movie)
